SET_EVENT_MASK.TOOLTIP: Control which events are generated by the HCI for the host.

READ_TX_PWR_LVL.TOOLTIP: Read TX power level for a connection.

SET_CONTROLLER_TO_HOST_FC.TOOLTIP: Turn flow control on/off for data sent from the Controller to the Host.

HOST_BUFFER_SIZE.TOOLTIP: Notify the Controller about the maximum data size of HCI ACL and Synchronous packets sent from the Controller to the Host.

HOST_NUM_CMPL_PKTS.TOOLTIP: Notify the Controller about the number of HCI packets that have been completed for each connection since the previous call of this command.

SET_EVENT_MASK_PAGE2.TOOLTIP: Control which events are generated by the HCI for the Host (continued from SET_EVENT_MASK).

READ_AUTH_PAYLOAD_TO.TOOLTIP: Read the authenticated payload timeout for a connection.

WRITE_AUTH_PAYLOAD_TO.TOOLTIP: Write the authenticated payload timeout value for a connection.

CONFIG_DATA_PATH.TOOLTIP: Configure the data transport path in between the Controller and the Host in the indicated direction.
